member.name: T:PepperDash.Core.Device
member.summary: The core event and status-bearing class that most if not all device and connectors can derive from.

member.name: T:PepperDash.Core.IKeyName
member.summary: Named Keyed device interface. Forces the devie to have a Unique Key and a name.

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.Activate
member.summary: Gets this device ready to be used in the system. Runs any added pre-activation items, and all post-activation at end. Classes needing additional logic to run should override CustomActivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.CustomActivate
member.summary: Called in between Pre and PostActivationActions when Activate() is called. Override to provide addtitional setup when calling activation. Overriding classes do not need to call base.CustomActivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.Deactivate
member.summary: Call to deactivate device - unlink events, etc. Overriding classes do not need to call base.Deactivate()

member.name: M:PepperDash.Core.Device.OnFalse(System.Object,System.Action)
member.summary: Helper method to check object for bool value false and fire an Action method
member.param: Should be of type bool, others will be ignored
Action to be run when o is false

member.summary: Event for client connection socket status change

member.name: E:PepperDash.Core.GenericTcpIpServer.ServerClientReadyForCommunications
member.summary: For a server with a pre shared key, this will fire after the communication is established and the key exchange is complete. If no shared key, this will fire after connection is successful. Use this event to know when the client is ready for communication to avoid stepping on shared key.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericTcpIpServer.ServerHasChoked
member.summary: A band aid event to notify user that the server has choked.

member.summary: Bool showing if socket is connected

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericTcpIpServer.SharedKeyRequired
member.summary: Bool to show whether the server requires a preshared key. Must be set the same in the client, and if true shared keys must be identical on server/client

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericTcpIpServer.USharedKeyRequired
member.summary: S+ helper for requires shared key bool

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericTcpIpServer.SharedKey
member.summary: SharedKey is sent for varification to the server. Shared key can be any text (255 char limit in SIMPL+ Module), but must match the Shared Key on the Server module. If SharedKey changes while server is listening or clients are connected, disconnect and stop listening will be called

member.summary: Heartbeat Required bool sets whether server disconnects client if heartbeat is not received

member.summary: Milliseconds before server expects another heartbeat. Set by property HeartbeatRequiredIntervalInSeconds which is driven from S+

member.summary: Simpl+ Heartbeat Analog value in seconds

member.summary: Private flag to note that the server has stopped intentionally

member.summary: Bool value for secure. Currently not implemented in TCP sockets as they are not dynamic

member.summary: Require a shared key that both server and client negotiate. If negotiation fails server disconnects the client

member.summary: The interval in seconds for the heartbeat from the client. If not received client is disconnected

member.summary: If the client hangs, add to counter and maybe fire the choke event

member.name: E:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.TextReceivedQueueInvoke
member.summary: Event for Receiving text. Once subscribed to this event the receive callback will start a thread that dequeues the messages and invokes the event on a new thread. It is not recommended to use both the TextReceived event and the TextReceivedQueueInvoke event.

member.name: E:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.ClientConnectionChange
member.summary: Event for client connection socket status change

member.name: E:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.ServerClientReadyForCommunications
member.summary: For a server with a pre shared key, this will fire after the communication is established and the key exchange is complete. If no shared key, this will fire after connection is successful. Use this event to know when the client is ready for communication to avoid stepping on shared key.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.ServerHasChoked
member.summary: A band aid event to notify user that the server has choked.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.ReceiveQueueSize
member.summary: Receive Queue size. Defaults to 20. Will set to 20 if QueueSize property is less than 20. Use constructor or set queue size property before calling initialize.

member.summary: Text representation of the Socket Status enum values for the server

member.summary: Bool showing if socket is connected

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.IsListening
member.summary: Bool showing if socket is connected

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.MaxClients
member.summary: Max number of clients this server will allow for connection. Crestron max is 64. This number should be less than 65

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.SharedKeyRequired
member.summary: Bool to show whether the server requires a preshared key. Must be set the same in the client, and if true shared keys must be identical on server/client

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.USharedKeyRequired
member.summary: S+ helper for requires shared key bool

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.SharedKey
member.summary: SharedKey is sent for varification to the server. Shared key can be any text (255 char limit in SIMPL+ Module), but must match the Shared Key on the Server module. If SharedKey changes while server is listening or clients are connected, disconnect and stop listening will be called

member.summary: Heartbeat Required bool sets whether server disconnects client if heartbeat is not received

member.summary: Milliseconds before server expects another heartbeat. Set by property HeartbeatRequiredIntervalInSeconds which is driven from S+

member.summary: Simpl+ Heartbeat Analog value in seconds

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.GenericSecureTcpIpServer.HeartbeatStringToMatch
member.summary: String to Match for heartbeat. If null or empty any string will reset heartbeat timer

member.summary: Private flag to note that the server has stopped intentionally

member.summary: For a client with a pre shared key, this will fire after the communication is established and the key exchange is complete. If you require a key and subscribe to the socket change event and try to send data on a connection the data sent will interfere with the key exchange and disconnect.

member.name: T:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject
member.summary: Tcp Server Config object with properties for a tcp server with shared key and heartbeat capabilities

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.MaxClients
member.summary: Max Clients that the server will allow to connect.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.Secure
member.summary: Bool value for secure. Currently not implemented in TCP sockets as they are not dynamic

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.Port
member.summary: Port for the server to listen on

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.SharedKeyRequired
member.summary: Require a shared key that both server and client negotiate. If negotiation fails server disconnects the client

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.SharedKey
member.summary: The shared key that must match on the server and client

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.HeartbeatRequired
member.summary: Require a heartbeat on the client/server connection that will cause the server/client to disconnect if the heartbeat is not received. heartbeats do not raise received events.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.HeartbeatRequiredIntervalInSeconds
member.summary: The interval in seconds for the heartbeat from the client. If not received client is disconnected

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.HeartbeatStringToMatch
member.summary: HeartbeatString that will be checked against the message received. defaults to heartbeat if no string is provided.

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.BufferSize
member.summary: Client buffer size. See Crestron help. defaults to 2000 if not greater than 2000

member.name: P:PepperDash.Core.TcpServerConfigObject.ReceiveQueueSize
member.summary: Receive Queue size must be greater than 20 or defaults to 20
